thread.title: Cold war between Sonakshi Sinha and Arjun Kapoor?
thread.title_full: Cold war between Sonakshi Sinha and Arjun Kapoor? - Times of India

author: timesofindia.indiatimes.com
title: Cold war between Sonakshi Sinha and Arjun Kapoor?
text:
After a rumoured breakup in early 2015, Sonakshi Sinha and Arjun Kapoor still refuse to see eye-to-eye. The two stars who never publicly acknowledged their relationship, seemed to have parted ways after the failure of their film 'Tevar'. 

Pack a punch like Sonakshi Sinha 
At a recent fashion show, both Arjun and Sonakshi were present to cheer on fashion designer Kunal Rawal , a mutual friend. Reportedly, Sonakshi chatted at length with Arjun's fellow showstopper Varun Dhawan , but refused to acknowledge Arjun's presence completely, who reciprocated the gesture as well. 

This isn't the first time the cold vibes have made news though. The 'Akira' actress was conversing with a bunch of friends at Ekta Kapoor's Diwali party, and ensured she didn't bump into Arjun, who was also in attendance. 

Best Showstopper Looks of Sonakshi Sinha @ LFW '17 1 15 Best Showstopper Looks of Sonakshi Sinha @ LFW '17 This is the new 2017 edition of Lakme fashion week where Sonakshi Sinha displays the creation of fashion designer Monisha Jaising during the opening show at Costa neoClassica in Mumbai. Best Showstopper Looks of Sonakshi Sinha @ LFW '17 The beautiful orange dress that Sonakshi is wearing is designed by Monisha Jaising, who has been getting so much applaud globally, thanks to Deepika Padukone who was seen in her creations on most of the international red-carpet events. Best Showstopper Looks of Sonakshi Sinha @ LFW '17 Sonakshi Sinha re-enacts the famous Titanic pose with Monisha Jaising during the opening show of Lakme Fashion Week Summer/Resort 2017 on Costa neoClassica in Mumbai. Best Showstopper Looks of Sonakshi Sinha @ LFW '17 Monisha Jaising showcased her designs on a luxury ship with a beautiful backdrop of the vast Arabian Sea. Best Showstopper Looks of Sonakshi Sinha @ LFW '17 Sonkshi Sinha was looking stunning in the tangerine and lime green one-shoulder satin gown featuring a long trail. Best Showstopper Looks of Sonakshi Sinha @ LFW '17 "Walking on the cruise wasn't tough for me. I had to walk on a side and there were no such twists and turns with the dress, so I managed it very well," she said. Best Showstopper Looks of Sonakshi Sinha @ LFW '17 Sonakshi Sinha posing for a photographer with Monisha Jaising during the opening show of Lakme Fashion Week Summer/Resort 2017 on Costa neoClassica in Mumbai. Best Showstopper Looks of Sonakshi Sinha @ LFW '17 Sonakshi looked radiant in the one shoulder asymmetrical dress, which also had a dramatic trail. The collection is said to be inspired by the Arabian Sea. The clothes were a mix of billowing silhouettes, couture, and all the summer hues. Best Showstopper Looks of Sonakshi Sinha @ LFW '17 The grand opening show by Monisha Jaising wasn't disappointing at all. The showstopper - Sonakshi Sinha made a head-turning entry in a burst of orange. Best Showstopper Looks of Sonakshi Sinha @ LFW '17 The 'Akira' girl of Bollywood carried Monisha Jaising's creation like a Boss, she proved that orange is the new black in 2017. Best Showstopper Looks of Sonakshi Sinha @ LFW '17 This is not the first time when Sonakshi Sinha dazzled at a fashion show. She has walked the ramp for fashion designers at umpteen shows. Best Showstopper Looks of Sonakshi Sinha @ LFW '17 The Akira actress won Fashion Reinvention of the Year award at Filmfare Glamour and Style Awards in 2015. Best Showstopper Looks of Sonakshi Sinha @ LFW '17 She had donned a red fish tail gown designed by none other than Monisha Jaisingh at Glamour and Style Awards in 2015. Best Showstopper Looks of Sonakshi Sinha @ LFW '17 Sonakshi made her debut in action-drama film Dabangg (2010) which led her to win the Filmfare Award for Best Female Debut. Best Showstopper Looks of Sonakshi Sinha @ LFW '17 She received critical acclaim for her portrayal of a woman suffering from tuberculosis in the romantic drama Lootera (2013), for which she was nominated for the Filmfare Award for Best Actress in 2013.
